get.description: Get a collection of all acquired plans that subscription has access to.

Get the list of delegated provider offers.
Get the specified delegated provider offer.
Lists all the directory tenants under the current subscription and given resource group name.
Get a directory tenant by name.

delete.description: Delete a directory tenant under a resource group.

put.description: Create or updates a directory tenant.

get.description: Get a list of all AzureStack location.
Get the list of offers under a resource group.

Unlink a plan from an offer.

get.description: Get the list of delegated offers.
List all plans across all subscriptions.

resource.description: Resource type display name related to the operation.

name.description: Name of the operation being performed on an object.

CheckNameAvailabilityDefinition.description: The check name availability action definition.

CheckNameAvailabilityResponse.description: The check name availability response definition

nameAvailable.description: A value indicating whether the name is available.

reason.description: The reason for the unavailability of the name.

NameUnavailabilityReason.description: The reason that the name is not available.

offerId.description: Identifier of the offer under the scope of a delegated provider.

Metric.description: The resource metric set that represents the metrics for a particular resource.

metricValues.description: Collected metric values in the timespan.

timeStamp.description: Timestamp of when the metric value was collected.

average.description: Average value for metric sample period.

minimum.description: Minimum value for metric sample period.

maximum.description: Maximum value for metric sample period.

total.description: Total value for metric sample period.

count.description: Number of measurements for metric sample period.

MetricPrimaryAggregationType.description: The primary aggregation type for resource metric.

timeGrain.description: The time grain. Metrics will be available for this time grain.

retention.description: the retention. Metrics may be queried for this interval.

MetricList.description: Holds an array of usage aggregates and the continuation token.

MetricDefinitionList.description: Holds an array of usage aggregates and the continuation token.

PlanAcquisition.description: Represents the acquisition of an add-on plan for a subscription.

properties.description: Represents the acquisition of an add-on plan for a subscription.

PlanAcquisitionProperties.description: Represents the acquisition of an add-on plan for a subscription.

id.description: Identifier in the tenant subscription context.

planId.description: Plan identifier in the tenant subscription context.

ProvisioningState.description: Provisioning state for subscriptions service resources, for example, resource provider registration.

values.description: The provisioning state is not specified.
values.name: NotSpecified

values.description: The provisioning state is accepted, and indicates provisioning is ongoing.
values.name: Accepted

values.description: The provisioning state is failed, and indicates the data is potentially out-of-sync with third parties.
values.name: Failed

values.description: The provisioning state is succeeded, and indicates the data is in-sync with third-parties.
values.name: Succeeded

subscriptionId.description: Subscription ID of tenant using plan.

usageStartTime.description: UTC start time for the usage bucket to which this usage aggregate belongs.

usageEndTime.description: UTC end time for the usage bucket to which this usage aggregate belongs.

instanceData.description: Key-value pairs of instance details represented as a string.

quantity.description: The amount of the resource consumption that occurred in this time frame.

meterId.description: Unique ID for the resource that was consumed (aka ResourceID).

DelegatedProviderOfferList.description: Holds an array of usage aggregates and the continuation token.

Location.description: Contains information about a geographical location where resource providers can be deployed.

Offer.description: Represents an offering of services against which a subscription can be created.

properties.description: Represents an offering of services against which a subscription can be created.

OfferProperties.description: Represents an offering of services against which a subscription can be created.

basePlanIds.description: Identifiers of the base plans that become available to the tenant immediately when a tenant subscribes to the offer.

addonPlanDefinition.description: References to add-on plans that a tenant can optionally acquire as a part of the offer.

AccessibilityState.description: Represents the state of the offer

values.description: The offer or plan is private. Only an Admin can see and manage it.
values.name: Private

values.description: The offer or plan is public. Users can see and self-subscribe to it.
values.name: Public

values.description: The offer or plan is decommissioned. Current subscriptions can still consume it but new subscriptions cannot.
values.name: Decommissioned

AddonPlanDefinition.description: Contains the name of the desired plan to be linked or unlinked from an offer.

maxAcquisitionCount.description: Maximum number of instances that can be acquired by a single subscription. If not specified, the assumed value is 1.

PlanLinkDefinition.description: Definition for linking and unlinking plans to offers.

maxAcquisitionCount.description: The maximum acquisition count by subscribers

subscriptionId.description: Identifier of the subscription receiving the delegated offer.

Plan.description: A plan represents a package of quotas and capabilities that are offered tenants. A tenant can acquire this plan through an offer to upgrade his access to underlying cloud services.

PlanList.description: Holds an array of usage aggregates and the continuation token.

allowCustomPortalBranding.description: Value indicating whether custom portal branding is allowed.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription.The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupParameter.description: The resource group the resource is located under.
ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroup
